attributes.action: ensure that Network rail has sufficient funding to reinstate double track on the total length of the railway between Exeter and Salisbury and to order that this work is carried out within the next 5 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current proposals to partially double the track between Exeter and Salisbury are short-sighted and do not reflect the growth potential for this line. Full reversal of the short-sighted BR singling is the only acceptable long term solution. This would allow a mixture of express and stopping services competing with the First Great Western franchise.
